attributes.action: bring forward legislation to reform drugs classification in light of the Fifth Report of Session 2005-06 of the Science and Technology Committee, which indicates in the scale of harm that Ecstasy is amongst the safest drugs and alcohol is amongst the most dangerous
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Science and Technology Committee's Fifth Report of Session 2005-06, HC1031, states:

"It is vital that the Government’s approach to drugs education is evidence based. A more scientifically based scale of harm would have greater credibility than the current system where the placing of drugs in particular categories is ultimately a
political decision."

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/drugpolicy/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
